entry.title: ‘Soft Launch’ of ERC-ChinaComx
entry.content:
Welcome to the website of our project, ChinaComx: Comics Culture in the People’s Republic of China!

  • To learn more about the project, see: About.
  • We are hiring! See Open Positions for all the information and come do research with us!
  • The team members introduce themselves here: Team
  • And if you want to get in touch with us — please do! — see contact for details.

This is an rudimentary webspace for the ChinaComx project in its starting phase; we are working on a more advanced website to be debuted with the “hard launch” of the project in September 2024.
